hero.title: Hi, I'm Geoffroy Stanger
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer passionate about building modern web applications, SaaS products, and crafting effective UX/UI experiences.

gojob.desc: Worked on the whole candidate proposal flow, from the automated candidate proposal to the candidate profile page using Next.js, React, Tailwind, Nest.js, Typescript, Pub/Sub, and PostgreSQL. Applied Domain-Driven Design (DDD) and Test-Driven Development (TDD) methodologies.

schaeffer.desc: Focused on test automation and frontend development using Angular, Typescript, and Cypress. Automated testing pipelines for enterprise new web applications.

fam.desc: Was responsible for building an internal web application using Fastify, Typescript, PostgreSQL, and Vue.js, whose goal was to collect data from client requests. Designed REST APIs and contributed to application architecture and deployment with Docker.

kiwi2023.desc: Contributed to the development of Windows desktop applications using Go. Implemented Microsoft Teams backup functionality using the Microsoft Graph API.

systancia.desc: Built scripts to automate Linkedin data extraction with Phantombuster and Python. Saved the extracted leads to a MSSQL database.

kiwi2021.desc: Developed CLI tools for system administrators using Go to manage MongoDB databases. Implemented automation for routine tasks and improved system monitoring.

sarpbc.name: Sarpbc.org
sarpbc.description: A news and data website for Rocket League esports, built with Nuxt, TailwindCSS, and NestJS.

tissuco.name: Tissuco
tissuco.description: A SaaS platform that helps second-hand resellers manage their inventory and orders, built with Nuxt, Tailwind CSS, and NestJS.
